thread.title: BRIEF-Bayer Details Conditions Of Russian Approval Of Monsanto Deal

title: BRIEF-Bayer Details Conditions Of Russian Approval Of Monsanto Deal
text:
April 20, 2018 / 9:33 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Bayer Details Conditions Of Russian Approval Of Monsanto Deal Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Bayer AG: 
* CONDITION FOR RUSSIAN APPROVAL WAS TRANSFER OF DEFINED TECHNOLOGIES TO RUSSIAN RECIPIENTS IN THE AREA OF SEEDS BREEDING, DIGITAL FARMING FOR 5 YEARS 
* WILL ALSO GRANT NON-DISCRIMINATORY ACCESS TO DIGITAL FARMING TECHNOLOGIES AFTER COMMERCIAL LAUNCH IN RUSSIAN FEDERATION 
* ARE WORKING CLOSELY WITH THE AUTHORITIES WORLDWIDE WITH THE GOAL OF CLOSING THE TRANSACTION IN THE SECOND QUARTER OF 2018 Further company coverage:
